Record.ClassificationPath: Hemic and Lymphatic Diseases/Lymphatic Diseases/Lymphoproliferative Disorders/Immunoblastic Lymphadenopathy
Immune System Diseases/Immunoproliferative Disorders/Lymphoproliferative Disorders/Immunoblastic Lymphadenopathy
Record.Description: A disorder characterized by proliferation of arborizing small vessels, prominent immunoblastic proliferations and amorphous acidophilic interstitial material. Clinical manifestations include fever, sweats, weight loss, generalized lymphadenopathy and frequently hepatosplenomegaly.
